user_input: Please create hourly Electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the TYNDP study requirements.

tasks.description: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the specified scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) and years (2030, 2035, 2040, 2050).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate object from the following list.

tasks.description: Split the nodes in the generated demand profiles into subsets as required.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate object from the following list.

tasks.description: Convert the hourly demand profiles into the TST format required by the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate object from the following list.
